channel.title: Teleports
channel.description:
Hello, I have a questions. How do I make it so when you click on the home teleport you have two options to teleport to. Here's a Screenie of what I mean.
[url=http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=4hawec&s=7]http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=4hawec&s=7[/url]
Thanks

item.title: Teleports
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

Alright, in my case (PI based, Hybrid PvP source) I have this:

File: ClickingButtons.java

case 51023: case 6005: c.getDH().sendOption5("Lumbridge", "Torva and Virtus (Donator Only)", "Slayer Cave", "Chaotic Cave", "PK Gear Cave (High Level Wild)"); c.teleAction = 20; break;

So you can there make your teleport case that you want to use if that’s your home teleport it would (in my case) be case 50056, so You’d add this to it:

case 50056: c.getDH().sendOption5("Home", "Second Home"); c.teleAction = 20; break;

And after that you want to redirect your teleports to the coordinates you want, you’ll just have to figure out what case the first teleprt will be and what case the second will be, and than you can add the coords you want them to teleport you to.

PLEASE NOTE I DID NOT TEST THIS BUT IM PRETTY SURE IT WILL WORK

Read full topic

item.title: Teleports
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

What I do then?

Read full topic

item.title: Teleports
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Tech Python, post:7, topic:412248”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=513507.msg3728218#msg3728218 date=1314448144]
You should have another teleport like that in your source correct? Just copy it and edit it to work with the home teleport.

If you don’t know how post the code.
[/quote]
that has got to be the most retarded answer i’ve ever seen… ?? … seriously? … like 90% of sources don’t even come with it…[/quote]
Every PI base has it, you idiot. Just find the actionbutton id and add c.getDH().sendDialogue(#, 39);

Read full topic
